atk-s0401a3:1_1: Tatiyassa paṭhame abhāvitanti avaḍḍhitaṁ bhāvanāvasena appavattitaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:1_2: Akammaniyaṁ hotīti kammakkhamaṁ kammayoggaṁ na hoti.
atk-s0401a3:1_4: Ettha ca paṭhame cittanti vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:2_2: Mahato anatthāya saṁvattatīti devamanussasampattiyo mārabrahmaissariyāni ca dadamānampi punappunaṁ jātijarābyādhimaraṇasokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāse
atk-s0401a3:2_3: khandhadhātuāyatanapaṭiccasamuppādavaṭṭāni ca dadamānaṁ kevalaṁ dukkhakkhandhameva detīti mahato anatthāya
atk-s0401a3:3_3: vaṭṭavasena uppannacittaṁ nāma uppannampi abhāvitaṁ apātubhūtameva hoti. Kasmā ?
atk-s0401a3:3_5: Vivaṭṭavasena uppannaṁ pana bhāvitaṁ pātubhūtaṁ nāma hoti. Kasmā?
atk-s0401a3:5_1: Navame ‘‘jātipi dukkhā’’tiādinā nayena vuttaṁ dukkhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti dukkhādhivahaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:5_4: lokuttarapādakajjhānādi ariyadhammābhimukhaṁ dukkhena adhivāhīyati pesīyatīti dukkhādhivāhaṁ.
atk-s0401a3:5_6: Tañhi vuttappakārā devamanussādisampattiyo dadamānampi jātiādīnaṁ adhivahanato dukkhādhivahaṁ,
atk-s0401a3:6_7: phalasukhato nibbānasukhaṁ adhivahati āharatīti sukhādhivahaṁ nāma hoti,
atk-s0401a3:6_9: Tañhi lokuttarapādakajjhānādiariyadhammābhimukhaṁ supesayaṁ vissaṭṭhaindavajirasadisaṁ hotīti sukhādhivāhantipi vuccati.
